channel.title: Ilhan Demirer's Blog
channel.description: Weekly insights on hospitality, business, and tech.

item.title: This week in Hospitality & Tourism #15 2025
item.description: The U.S. hotel industry reported mixed year-over-year comparisons, according to CoStar’s latest data through 5 April.
item.dc:creator: Ilhan Demirer

item.title: This week in Hospitality & Tourism #14 2025
item.description: On the positive side of the Easter calendar shift, the U.S. hotel industry reported increases across the key performance metrics, according to CoStar’s latest data through 29 March.
item.dc:creator: Ilhan Demirer

item.title: This week in Hospitality & Tourism #13 2025
item.description: The U.S. hotel industry reported positive year-over-year comparisons, according to CoStar’s latest data through 22 March.

item.title: This week in Hospitality & Tourism #5 2025
item.description: As expected with the MLK Day holiday, the U.S. hotel industry reported mixed year-over-year comparisons, according to CoStar’s latest data through 25 January.
item.dc:creator: Ilhan Demirer

item.title: This week in Hospitality & Tourism #4 2025
item.description: On the positive side of the MLK Day calendar shift, the U.S. hotel industry reported positive year-over-year comparisons, according to CoStar’s latest data through 18 January.

item.title: This week in Hospitality & Tourism #2 2025

item.title: This week in Hospitality & Tourism #1 2025
item.description: The U.S. hotel industry reported negative year-over-year comparisons during the holiday week, according to CoStar’s latest data through 28 December.
